There are several instruments that can achieve electrocautery. These 5 Argon Plasma Coagulation Treatment include the needle knife, snare, hot forceps, and blunt Strategy probe, each of which has their own unique application whichisdiscussedbelow. APC is a noncontact mode that can be used for burning the superficial layer of mucosal lesions of several millimeter thickness causing superficial electrocoagulation.
